subject: World Baseball Classic
lead_paragraph: The Minnesota Twins’ Francisco Liriano and the Tampa Bay Rays’ Scott Kazmir said they would not play in the World Baseball Classic. Liriano, who would have played for the Dominican Republic, had a rocky start last season while recovering from Tommy John surgery in his pitching elbow.
